ShortDescription.Value: Control City Traffic Volume By 4 Factors

Publish.LongDescription:
# TrafficUnlocker # 交通解锁
## Control City Traffic Volume By 4 Factors ## 由四个参数控制城市交通量
* TrafficReduction: Larger values reduce citizens moving around more aggressively in large cities(0~0.1) * WorkProbability: The probability that employees going to work every day. The higher the value, the more employees will go to work every day.(0~100) * SchoolProbability: The probability that students go to school every day. The higher the value, the more students will go to school every day.(0~100) * LeisureProbability: (NOT SURE) The probability of citizens staying at home. The higher the value, the higher the probability that idle citizens will stay at home. (0~100)
* 交通抑制: 交通抑制系数。数值越大，随着人口增长，对交通的抑制越大。（0~0.1） * 上班概率: 员工每天去上班的概率，数值越高，每天会有越多的员工去上班。(0~100) * 上学概率: 学生每天去学校上学的概率，数值越高，每天会有越多的学生去学校。（0~100） * 闲置概率: （不确定）市民宅家的概率，数值越高，空闲的市民宅在家里的概率越高。（0~100）
**For the relationship between the four parameters with population growth, please refer to the following link: [CitiesSkyline II Traffic Factors Calculation](https://www.geogebra.org/classic/wnsua5kg)**
**四个参数随人口增长的关系可参考以下链接：[天际线交通参数计算](https://www.geogebra.org/classic/wnsua5kg)**
